title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Sam Darnold’s 3-0 start with the Panthers after all the struggles he had with a dysfunctional Jets team. He talks about the recent comments made by Tom Brady’s trainer and father and what this says about the relationship he had with his former head coach Bill Belichick. He also gives his Blazing 5 picks for week 3 of the NFL season. Plus, former Bears LB Lance Briggs joins the show to set some realistic expectations for QB Justin Fields in his first NFL start.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
